answerText: positrons [prompt on "antielectron"][10] These objects play the role of "coefficients" in the Dirac equation. They are mutually anticommuting and can be constructed by taking tensor products of the Pauli matrices and the identity.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Editors 3 | 16 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Negative energy solutions to the Dirac equation predicted the existence of these particles. For 10 points each: [10] Name these positively charged particles, the antiparticles of electrons. They were experimentally discovered in cosmic rays by Carl Anderson.
